subject: Re: Greetings!!
body:
*Attn: Rosalba,*
*Greetings!!*
*Thank you for your prompt response.*
*This is to inform you that your name is among the first beneficiaries that
has been approved to receive their long overdue pending payment for
this **first
quarter of the year, but after the meeting held yesterday with the
regulatory authorities trying to process your fund transfer, we receive a
signal message from Mr. Martin Bühler of Switzerland, claiming to be your
representative, asking the bank to transfer the fund $15 Million to his own
forwarded personal bank account in **Switzerland.*

*However note, that this approved amount of $15,000,000,00 Fifteen Million
United State Dollars, is funds instructed by United Nations Compensation
Commission. Moving forward, we are happy you responded very quickly to our
email. Therefore, I will advise and also encourage you to urgently forward
your details to enable the bank to transfer your fund into your Country
bank account.*

*1. Your full name*
*2. Your Home or office address*
*3. Your direct telephone number for easy communication.*
*4. Your Identification ( ID Card)*

*Once we are in respect of the above information, I will tell you what to
do next.*



*I wait for your urgent reply.Thank youMr. Bert Koenders*

subject: Re: Attn: Sir
body:
*Attn: Rosalba,*
*Greetings!!*
*We are still waiting for your response to enable us to proceed on the
transfer process. Remember, you are the one delaying your processing
pending fund transfer till this moment. Therefore, your advice to forward
your information to enable us to serve you better.*



*I wait for your urgent reply.Thank youMr. Bert Koenders*
